00019 void Writer::close() {
00020   _write = &Writer::writeLattice;

00022 
00023 bool Writer::open(const Param &param) {
00024   const std::string ostyle = param.get<std::string>("output-format-type");
00025   _write = &Writer::writeLattice;
00026 
00027   if (ostyle == "wakati") {
00028     _write = &Writer::writeWakati;
00029   } else if (ostyle == "none") {
00030     _write = &Writer::writeNone;
00031   } else if (ostyle == "dump") {
00032     _write = &Writer::writeDump;
00033   } else if (ostyle == "em") {
00034     _write = &Writer::writeEM;
00035   } else {
00036     // default values
00037     std::string node_format = "%m\\t%H\\n";
00038     std::string unk_format  = "%m\\t%H\\n";
00039     std::string bos_format  = "";
00040     std::string eos_format  = "EOS\\n";
00041     std::string eon_format  = "";
00042 
00043     std::string node_format_key = "node-format";
00044     std::string bos_format_key  = "bos-format";
00045     std::string eos_format_key  = "eos-format";
00046     std::string unk_format_key  = "unk-format";
00047     std::string eon_format_key  = "eon-format";
00048 
00049     if (!ostyle.empty()) {
00050       node_format_key += "-";
00051       node_format_key += ostyle;
00052       bos_format_key += "-";
00053       bos_format_key += ostyle;
00054       eos_format_key += "-";
00055       eos_format_key += ostyle;
00056       unk_format_key += "-";
00057       unk_format_key += ostyle;
00058       eon_format_key += "-";
00059       eon_format_key += ostyle;
00060       const std::string tmp = param.get<std::string>(node_format_key.c_str());
00061       CHECK_FALSE(!tmp.empty())
00062           << "unknown format type [" << ostyle << "]";
00063     }
00064 
00065     const std::string node_format2 =
00066         param.get<std::string>(node_format_key.c_str());
00067     const std::string bos_format2 =
00068         param.get<std::string>(bos_format_key.c_str());
00069     const std::string eos_format2 =
00070         param.get<std::string>(eos_format_key.c_str());
00071     const std::string unk_format2 =
00072         param.get<std::string>(unk_format_key.c_str());
00073     const std::string eon_format2 =
00074         param.get<std::string>(eon_format_key.c_str());
00075 
00076     if (node_format != node_format2 || bos_format != bos_format2 ||
00077         eos_format != eos_format2 || unk_format != unk_format2) {
00078       _write = &Writer::writeUser;
00079       if (node_format != node_format2) node_format = node_format2;
00080       if (bos_format != bos_format2) bos_format = bos_format2;
00081       if (eos_format != eos_format2) eos_format = eos_format2;
00082       if (unk_format != unk_format2)
00083         unk_format = unk_format2;
00084       else if (node_format != node_format2)
00085         unk_format = node_format2;
00086       else
00087         unk_format = node_format;
00088       if (eon_format != eon_format2) eon_format = eon_format2;
00089       node_format_.reset_string(node_format.c_str());
00090       bos_format_.reset_string(bos_format.c_str());
00091       eos_format_.reset_string(eos_format.c_str());
00092       unk_format_.reset_string(unk_format.c_str());
00093       eon_format_.reset_string(eon_format.c_str());
00094     }
00095   }
00096 
00097   return true;
00098 }
00099 
00100 bool Writer::write(StringBuffer *os, const char* str, const Node *bosNode) {
00101   return (this->*_write)(os, str, bosNode);
00102 }
00103 
00104 bool Writer::writeLattice(StringBuffer *os, const char* str,
00105                           const Node *bosNode) {
00106   for (const Node *node = bosNode->next; node->next; node = node->next) {
00107     os->write(node->surface, node->length);
00108     *os << '\t' << node->feature;  // << '\t';
00109     *os << '\n';
00110   }
00111   *os << "EOS\n";
00112   return true;
00113 }
00114 
00115 bool Writer::writeWakati(StringBuffer *os, const char*,
00116                          const Node *bosNode) {
00117   for (const Node *node = bosNode->next; node->next; node = node->next) {
00118     os->write(node->surface, node->length);
00119     *os << ' ';
00120   }
00121   *os << '\n';
00122   return true;
00123 }
00124 
00125 bool Writer::writeNone(StringBuffer *, const char*, const Node *) {
00126   return true;  // do nothing
00127 }
00128 
00129 bool Writer::writeUser(StringBuffer *os, const char* str,
00130                        const Node *bosNode) {
00131   if (!writeNode(os, bos_format_.get(), str, bosNode)) return false;
00132   const Node *node = 0;
00133   const char *fmt = 0;
00134   for (node = bosNode->next; node->next; node = node->next) {
00135     fmt = (node->stat == MECAB_UNK_NODE ? unk_format_.get() :
00136            node_format_.get());
00137     if (!writeNode(os, fmt, str, node)) return false;
00138   }
00139   if (!writeNode(os, eos_format_.get(), str, node)) return false;
00140   return true;
00141 }
00142 
00143 bool Writer::writeEM(StringBuffer *os, const char* str,
00144                      const Node *bosNode) {
00145   static const float min_prob = 0.0001;
00146   for (const Node *node = bosNode; node; node = node->next) {
00147     if (node->prob >= min_prob) {
00148       *os << "U\t";
00149       if (node->stat == MECAB_BOS_NODE)
00150         *os << "BOS";
00151       else if (node->stat == MECAB_EOS_NODE)
00152         *os << "EOS";
00153       else
00154         os->write(node->surface, node->length);
00155       *os << '\t' << node->feature << '\t' << node->prob << '\n';
00156     }
00157     for (const Path *path = node->lpath; path; path = path->lnext) {
00158       if (path->prob >= min_prob) {
00159         *os << "B\t" << path->lnode->feature << '\t'
00160             << node->feature << '\t' << path->prob << '\n';
00161       }
00162     }
00163   }
00164   *os << "EOS\n";
00165   return true;
00166 }
00167 
00168 bool Writer::writeDump(StringBuffer *os, const char* str,
00169                        const Node *bosNode) {
00170   for (const Node *node = bosNode; node; node = node->next) {
00171     *os << node->id << ' ';
00172     if (node->stat == MECAB_BOS_NODE)
00173       *os << "BOS";
00174     else if (node->stat == MECAB_EOS_NODE)
00175       *os << "EOS";
00176     else
00177       os->write(node->surface, node->length);
00178 
00179     *os << ' ' << node->feature
00180         << ' ' << static_cast<int>(node->surface - str)
00181         << ' ' << static_cast<int>(node->surface - str + node->length)
00182         << ' ' << node->rcAttr
00183         << ' ' << node->lcAttr
00184         << ' ' << node->posid
00185         << ' ' << static_cast<int>(node->char_type)
00186         << ' ' << static_cast<int>(node->stat)
00187         << ' ' << static_cast<int>(node->isbest)
00188         << ' ' << node->alpha
00189         << ' ' << node->beta
00190         << ' ' << node->prob
00191         << ' ' << node->cost;
00192 
00193     for (const Path *path = node->lpath; path; path = path->lnext) {
00194       *os << ' ' << path->lnode->id << ':' << path->cost << ':' << path->prob;
00195     }
00196     *os << '\n';
00197   }
00198   return true;
00199 }
00200 
00201 bool Writer::writeNode(StringBuffer *os, const char *sentence,
00202                        const Node *node) {
00203   switch (node->stat) {
00204     case MECAB_BOS_NODE:
00205       return writeNode(os, bos_format_.get(),  sentence, node);
00206     case MECAB_EOS_NODE:
00207       return writeNode(os, eos_format_.get(),  sentence, node);
00208     case MECAB_UNK_NODE:
00209       return writeNode(os, unk_format_.get(),  sentence, node);
00210     case MECAB_NOR_NODE:
00211       return writeNode(os, node_format_.get(), sentence, node);
00212     case MECAB_EON_NODE:
00213       return writeNode(os, eon_format_.get(), sentence, node);
00214   }
00215   return true;
00216 }
00217 
00218 bool Writer::writeNode(StringBuffer *os, const char *p,
00219                        const char *sentence, const Node *node) {
00220   char buf[BUF_SIZE];
00221   char *ptr[64];
00222   size_t psize = 0;
00223 
00224   for (; *p; p++) {
00225     switch (*p) {
00226       default: *os << *p; break;
00227 
00228       case '\\': *os << getEscapedChar(*++p); break;
00229 
00230       case '%': {  // macros
00231         switch (*++p) {
00232           default: CHECK_FALSE(false) << "unkonwn meta char " << *p;
00233             // input sentence
00234           case 'S': os->write(sentence, std::strlen(sentence)); break;
00235             // sentence length
00236           case 'L': *os << std::strlen(sentence); break;
00237             // morph
00238           case 'm': os->write(node->surface, node->length); break;
00239           case 'M': os->write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>
00240                               (node->surface - node->rlength + node->length),
00241                               node->rlength);
00242             break;
00243           case 'h': *os << node->posid; break;  // Part-Of-Speech ID
00244           case '%': *os << '%'; break;         // %
00245           case 'c': *os << static_cast<int>(node->wcost); break;  // word cost
00246           case 'H': *os << node->feature; break;
00247           case 't': *os << static_cast<unsigned int>(node->char_type); break;
00248           case 's': *os << static_cast<unsigned int>(node->stat); break;
00249           case 'P': *os << node->prob; break;
00250           case 'p': {
00251             switch (*++p) {
00252               default: CHECK_FALSE(false)
00253                   << "[iseSCwcnblLh] is required after %p";
00254               case 'i': *os << node->id; break;  // node id
00255               case 'S': os->write(reinterpret_cast<const char*>
00256                                   (node->surface -
00257                                    node->rlength + node->length),
00258                                   node->rlength - node->length);
00259                 break;  // space
00260                 // start position
00261               case 's': *os << static_cast<int>(node->surface - sentence);
00262                 break;
00263                 // end position
00264               case 'e': *os << static_cast<int>
00265                     (node->surface - sentence + node->length);
00266                 break;
00267                 // connection cost
00268               case 'C': *os << node->cost -
00269                     node->prev->cost - node->wcost;
00270                 break;
00271               case 'w': *os << node->wcost; break;  // word cost
00272               case 'c': *os << node->cost; break;  // best cost
00273               case 'n': *os << (node->cost - node->prev->cost); break;
00274                 // node cost
00275                 // * if best path, otherwise ' '
00276               case 'b': *os << (node->isbest ? '*' : ' '); break;
00277               case 'P': *os << node->prob; break;
00278               case 'A': *os << node->alpha; break;
00279               case 'B': *os << node->beta; break;
00280               case 'l': *os << node->length; break;  // length of morph
00281                 // length of morph including the spaces
00282               case 'L': *os << node->rlength;    break;
00283               case 'h': {  // Hidden Layer ID
00284                 switch (*++p) {
00285                   default: CHECK_FALSE(false) << "lr is required after %ph";
00286                   case 'l': *os << node->lcAttr; break;   // current
00287                   case 'r': *os << node->rcAttr; break;   // prev
00288                 }
00289               } break;
00290 
00291               case 'p': {
00292                 char mode = *++p;
00293                 char sep = *++p;
00294                 if (sep == '\\') sep = getEscapedChar(*++p);
00295                 CHECK_FALSE(node->lpath)
00296                     << "no path information, use -l option";
00297                 for (Path *path = node->lpath; path; path = path->lnext) {
00298                   if (path != node->lpath) *os << sep;
00299                   switch (mode) {
00300                     case 'i': *os << path->lnode->id; break;
00301                     case 'c': *os << path->cost; break;
00302                     case 'P': *os << path->prob; break;
00303                     default: CHECK_FALSE(false)
00304                         << "[icP] is required after %pp";
00305                   }
00306                 }
00307               } break;
00308 
00309             }
00310           } break;
00311 
00312           case 'F':
00313           case 'f': {
00314             CHECK_FALSE(node->feature[0] != '\0')
00315                 << "no feature information available";
00316 
00317             if (!psize) {
00318               std::strncpy(buf, node->feature, sizeof(buf));
00319               psize = tokenizeCSV(buf, ptr, sizeof(ptr));
00320             }
00321 
00322             // separator
00323             char separator = '\t';  // default separator
00324             if (*p == 'F') {  // change separator
00325               if (*++p == '\\')
00326                 separator = getEscapedChar(*++p);
00327               else
00328                 separator = *p;
00329             }
00330 
00331             CHECK_FALSE(*++p =='[') << "cannot find '['";
00332             size_t n = 0;
00333             bool sep = false;
00334             bool isfil = false;
00335             p++;
00336 
00337             for (;; ++p) {
00338               switch (*p) {
00339                 case '0': case '1': case '2': case '3': case '4':
00340                 case '5': case '6': case '7': case '8': case '9':
00341                   n = 10 * n +(*p - '0');
00342                   break;
00343                 case ',': case ']':
00344                   CHECK_FALSE(n < psize) << "given index is out of range";
00345                   isfil = (ptr[n][0] != '*');
00346                   if (isfil) {
00347                     if (sep) *os << separator;
00348                     *os << ptr[n];
00349                   }
00350                   if (*p == ']') goto last;
00351                   sep = isfil;
00352                   n = 0;
00353                   break;
00354                 default:
00355                   CHECK_FALSE(false) << "cannot find ']'";
00356               }
00357             }
00358           } last: break;
00359         }  // end switch
00360       } break;  // end case '%'
00361     }  // end switch
00362   }
00363 
00364   return true;
00365 }
00366 }
